content.text: So after a year and a bit of work as a DevOps Engineer at AMA, I'm moving to another team within AMA as a Software Developer 2. It's a bit bitter sweet as I am excited to be able to do more development at work from a coding perspective, but I will miss the team I am currently on as they are really wonderful people and have been a pleasure to work with.

The plan is to transition out of my current role and into the new one over a period of a few months! So it will be exciting to learn the codebase of the new team and hopefully contribute meaningfully as soon as I can :).

Moving forward there are quite a few things I need to work on. I'm currently building a mobile app with a friend and need to really focus on finishing that! But more than that I want to start revisting old projects I had worked on in the past and cleaning them up. One in particular has been bugging me alot lately that I want to clean up quite a bit! So yeah that's whats been going on with me, I'm hopeful for a Covid 19 vaccine soon and look forward to finishing off some projects this year.
